title: Ultimate Skin installer
body: Can someone help me about the Ultimate skin installer ? it won't get me to the page where i can downlaod it. pls if you have a link for it or show me how i can download pls send me your answers. THANKS FOR THE SUPPORT ! The Tryndamain M8 M0r1J1n {{champion:23}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're trying to use a third party program, which isn't something we support.  You'll likely end up with more issues setting something like that up, like crashes, and we wouldn't be able to offer support.  I recommend being cautious about that, and [restoring your game](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to its natural state.
